cards.name: Hypnotic Specter
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever Hypnotic Specter deals damage to an opponent, that player discards a card at random.

rulings.text: The ability triggers even if the Specter’s damage is being redirected to an opponent. It does not trigger if damage that would have been dealt to the opponent is redirected to a nonopponent player or a creature, or if the damage is prevented.

cards.name: Junún Efreet
cards.text:
Flying
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Junún Efreet unless you pay {B}{B}.

foreignNames.name: ジュナン・イフリート

cards.name: Lord of the Pit
cards.text:
Flying, trample
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice a creature other than Lord of the Pit. If you can't, Lord of the Pit deals 7 damage to you.

rulings.text: If you control any other creatures as Lord of the Pit’s triggered ability resolves, you must sacrifice one. You can’t choose to be dealt 7 damage instead.

If Lord of the Pit has gained lifelink, being dealt 7 damage by it doesn’t cause your life total to change, even though you gain and lose life. If your life total is less than 7, you won’t lose the game.
If you have two Lords of the Pit, you can sacrifice them to each other.

cards.name: Lost Soul
cards.text: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)

cards.name: Marsh Gas
cards.text: All creatures get -2/-0 until end of turn.

cards.name: Mind Twist
cards.text: Target player discards X cards at random.

cards.name: Murk Dwellers
cards.text: Whenever Murk Dwellers attacks and isn't blocked, it gets +2/+0 until end of combat.

rulings.text: An ability that triggers when something “attacks and isn’t blocked” triggers in the declare blockers step after blockers are declared if (1) that creature is attacking and (2) no creatures are declared to block it. It will trigger even if that creature was put onto the battlefield attacking rather than having been declared as an attacker in the declare attackers step.

cards.name: Nether Shadow
cards.text:
Haste
At the beginning of your upkeep, if Nether Shadow is in your graveyard with three or more creature cards above it, you may put Nether Shadow onto the battlefield.

rulings.text: Since it enters the battlefield due to triggering at the beginning of upkeep, it is not possible to get an infinite loop with four Nether Shadows.
Note that bringing the Shadow back onto the battlefield from the graveyard is not a spell, it is an ability. It can’t be countered with something that counters spells.
Players may not rearrange the cards in their graveyards.

The last thing that happens to a resolving instant or sorcery spell is that it’s put into its owner’s graveyard. Example: You cast Wrath of God. All creatures on the battlefield are destroyed. You arrange all the cards put into your graveyard this way in any order you want. The other players in the game do the same to the cards that are put into their graveyards. Then you put Wrath of God into your graveyard, on top of the other cards.

Say you’re the owner of both a permanent and an Aura that’s attached to it. If both the permanent and the Aura are destroyed at the same time (by Akroma’s Vengeance, for example), you decide the order they’re put into your graveyard. If just the enchanted permanent is destroyed, it’s put into your graveyard first. Then, after state-based actions are checked, the Aura (which is no longer attached to anything) is put into your graveyard on top of it.
A card is “above” another card in your graveyard if it was put into that graveyard later.
If an effect or rule puts two or more cards into the same graveyard at the same time, the owner of those cards may arrange them in any order.

cards.name: Nightmare
cards.text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
Nightmare's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Swamps you control.

rulings.text: If you control 0 swamps, then the Nightmare has 0 toughness and will be put into its owner’s graveyard as a state-based action right before the next player gains priority.
Nightmare’s power and toughness changes as the number of Swamps you control changes.
The ability that defines Nightmare’s power and toughness works everywhere, not just on the battlefield.
Nightmare’s ability counts all lands you control with the subtype Swamp, not just ones named Swamp.

cards.name: Paralyze
cards.text:
Enchant creature
When Paralyze enters the battlefield, tap enchanted creature.
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.
At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, that player may pay {4}. If the player does, untap the creature.

rulings.text: Paying the cost is optional.
Paralyze can be cast targeting a creature which is already tapped.
The creature can only be untapped using Paralyze once per turn.
Two Paralyzes are not cumulative. Paying either one will untap the creature.
This is a change from the most recent wording. As was the case in the past, Paralyze itself has the last triggered ability, rather than granting that ability to the enchanted creature.

cards.name: Pestilence
cards.text:
At the beginning of the end step, if no creatures are on the battlefield, sacrifice Pestilence.
{B}: Pestilence deals 1 damage to each creature and each player.

rulings.text: Each activation is considered a new damage effect. An activation can only be 1 point of damage.
Note that “until end of turn” effects wear off after “at the beginning of the end step” triggered abilities, so an artifact that animates until end of turn can keep this on the battlefield.

It will stay on the battlefield if there is a creature that is put into the graveyard during the end step. This is because this ability will not trigger at all if there is at least one creature on the battlefield as the end step begins.

cards.name: Pit Scorpion
cards.text: Whenever Pit Scorpion deals damage to a player, that player gets a poison counter. (A player with ten or more poison counters loses the game.)

cards.name: Plague Rats
cards.text: Plague Rats's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures named Plague Rats on the battlefield.

cards.name: Rag Man
cards.text: {B}{B}{B}, {T}: Target opponent reveals their hand and discards a creature card at random. Activate this ability only during your turn.

cards.name: Raise Dead
cards.text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

rulings.text: You must show the card you bring out of the graveyard to your opponent.
The creature being brought back is chosen on announcement and not on resolution of the spell because it is targeted.

cards.name: Royal Assassin
cards.text: {T}: Destroy target tapped creature.

rulings.text: Can’t target itself because you choose the target before you tap him. At that time he is not yet a legal target.
If the creature is no longer tapped when the Assassin’s ability resolves, then the ability doesn’t resolve.

cards.name: Scavenging Ghoul
cards.text:
At the beginning of each end step, put a corpse counter on Scavenging Ghoul for each creature that died this turn.
Remove a corpse counter from Scavenging Ghoul: Regenerate Scavenging Ghoul.

rulings.text: The Ghoul still gets to claim counters even if it enters the battlefield after the creatures died.

cards.name: Sengir Vampire
cards.text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
Whenever a creature dealt damage by Sengir Vampire this turn dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Sengir Vampire.

rulings.text: If Sengir Vampire deals nonlethal damage to a creature and then a different effect or damage source causes that creature to be put into a graveyard later in the turn, Sengir Vampire’s ability will trigger and it will get a +1/+1 counter.

Each time a creature is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, check whether Sengir Vampire had dealt any damage to it at any time during that turn. If so, Sengir Vampire’s ability will trigger. It doesn’t matter who controlled the creature or whose graveyard it was put into.
If Sengir Vampire and a creature it dealt damage to are both put into a graveyard at the same time, Sengir Vampire’s ability will trigger, but it will do nothing when it resolves.

cards.name: Simulacrum
cards.text: You gain life equal to the damage dealt to you this turn. Simulacrum deals damage to target creature you control equal to the damage dealt to you this turn.

rulings.text: You can’t use Simulacrum on Loss of Life, just damage.
This is not damage prevention or redirection. It actually is life gain and newly dealt damage.
Simulacrum is the source of the damage. If an effect needs to know a characteristic of the damage’s source (Protection from Black, for instance), it will see the damage coming from Simulacrum.

cards.name: Sorceress Queen
cards.text: {T}: Target creature other than Sorceress Queen has base power and toughness 0/2 until end of turn.

cards.name: Spirit Shackle
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Whenever enchanted creature becomes tapped, put a -0/-2 counter on it.

rulings.text: Spirit Shackle’s ability triggers only when the enchanted creature changes from untapped to tapped. If Spirit Shackle enters the battlefield attached to an already tapped creature, it won’t do anything (until that creature untaps and becomes tapped again, that is).

cards.name: Terror
cards.text: Destroy target nonartifact, nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.

cards.name: Uncle Istvan
cards.text: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Uncle Istvan by creatures.

rulings.text: Works even on damage from activated abilities of creatures such as Prodigal Sorcerer.

foreignNames.name: イシュトヴァーンおじ

cards.name: Unholy Strength
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+1.

cards.name: Vampire Bats
cards.text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
{B}: Vampire Bats gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Activate this ability no more than twice each turn.

cards.name: Wall of Bone
cards.text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
{B}: Regenerate Wall of Bone. (The next time this creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)

cards.name: Warp Artifact
cards.text:
Enchant artifact
At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted artifact's controller, Warp Artifact deals 1 damage to that player.

cards.name: Weakness

Enchant creature

cards.name: Will-o'-the-Wisp
cards.text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
{B}: Regenerate Will-o'-the-Wisp. (The next time this creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)

cards.name: Word of Binding
cards.text: Tap X target creatures.

cards.name: Xenic Poltergeist
cards.text: {T}: Until your next upkeep, target noncreature artifact becomes an artifact creature with power and toughness each equal to its converted mana cost.

rulings.text: Wears off at the beginning of the upkeep, not during upkeep.

A noncreature permanent that turns into a creature can attack, and its {T} abilities can be activated, only if its controller has continuously controlled that permanent since the beginning of their most recent turn. It doesn’t matter how long the permanent has been a creature.

cards.name: Zombie Master
cards.text:
Other Zombie creatures have swampwalk. (They can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)
Other Zombies have "{B}: Regenerate this permanent."

cards.name: Abomination
cards.text: Whenever Abomination blocks or becomes blocked by a green or white creature, destroy that creature at end of combat.

rulings.text: The color of the blocking/blocked creature is checked only at declaration of the block. If the creature is green or white at that time, it will be destroyed at end of combat even if it changes color before combat ends.

foreignNames.name: Scheußlichkeit
foreignNames.text: Vernichte am Ende des Kampfes alle grünen und weißen Kreaturen, die die Scheußlichkeit blocken oder von ihr geblockt wurden.

cards.originalText: At the end of combat, destroy all green and white creatures blocking or blocked by Abomination.

cards.name: Animate Dead
cards.text:
Enchant creature card in a graveyard
When Animate Dead enters the battlefield, if it's on the battlefield, it loses "enchant creature card in a graveyard" and gains "enchant creature put onto the battlefield with Animate Dead." Return enchanted creature card to the battlefield under your control and attach Animate Dead to it. When Animate Dead leaves the battlefield, that creature's controller sacrifices it.
Enchanted creature gets -1/-0.

rulings.text: Animate Dead is an Aura, albeit with an unusual enchant ability. You target a creature card in a graveyard when you cast it. It enters the battlefield attached to that card. Then it returns that card to the battlefield, and attaches itself to the card again (since the card is a new object on the battlefield). Animate Dead itself never moves into a graveyard during this process.
If Animate Dead isn’t on the battlefield as its triggered ability resolves, none of its effects happen. The creature card won’t be returned to the battlefield.

Abilities such as shroud and protection function only on the battlefield unless otherwise specified. A creature card with shroud may be targeted by Animate Dead, and Animate Dead will become attached to the creature that enters the battlefield.

If the creature put onto the battlefield has protection from black—or if the creature can’t legally be enchanted by Animate Dead for another reason—Animate Dead won’t be able to attach to it. It will be put into the graveyard as a state-based action, causing its delayed triggered ability to trigger. When the trigger resolves, if the creature’s still on the battlefield, its controller will sacrifice it.

Once the creature is returned to the battlefield, Animate Dead can’t be attached to anything other than it (unless Animate Dead somehow manages to put a different creature onto the battlefield). Attempting to move Animate Dead to another creature won’t work.

cards.originalText: Take target creature from any graveyard and put it directly into play under your control with -1/-0. Treat this creature as though it were just summoned. If Animate Dead is removed, bury the creature in its owner's graveyard.

cards.name: Ashes to Ashes
cards.text: Exile two target nonartifact creatures. Ashes to Ashes deals 5 damage to you.
cards.flavor:
"All rivers eventually run to the sea. My job is to sort out who goes first."
—Maeveen O'Donagh, Memoirs of a Soldier

rulings.text: If one of the targeted creatures is an illegal target by the time Ashes to Ashes resolves, it still exiles the other one and deals 5 damage to you.
If both of the targeted creatures are illegal targets by the time Ashes to Ashes resolves, it’s countered. It doesn’t deal 5 damage to you.

foreignNames.name: Asche zu Asche
foreignNames.text: Asche zu Asche entfernt zwei Nicht-Artefakt- Kreaturen aus dem Spiel und fügt Dir 5 Schadenspunkte zu.

cards.originalText: Ashes to Ashes removes two target non-artifact creatures from the game and deals 5 damage to you.

cards.name: Black Knight
cards.text:
First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
Protection from white (This creature can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, or enchanted by anything white.)
cards.flavor: Battle doesn't need a purpose; the battle is its own purpose. You don't ask why a plague spreads or a field burns. Don't ask why I fight.
cards.originalText: Protection from white, first strike

cards.name: Cosmic Horror
cards.text:
First strike
At the beginning of your upkeep, destroy Cosmic Horror unless you pay {3}{B}{B}{B}. If Cosmic Horror is destroyed this way, it deals 7 damage to you.
cards.flavor:
". . . [S]creams of horror rend th' affrighted skies."
—Alexander Pope, The Rape of the Lock

rulings.text: If you choose not to pay Cosmic Horror’s upkeep cost, it deals 7 damage to you only if it’s actually destroyed. If it regenerates or an effect has given it indestructible, it deals no damage.

foreignNames.name: Schrecken aus dem All
foreignNames.text:
Hat Erstschlag
Zahle während Deiner Versorgungsphase 3BBB oder vernichte den Schrecken. Wenn Du den Schrecken aus dem All auf diese Art und Weise zerstörst fügt er Dir 7 Schadenspunkte zu.

cards.originalText:
First strike
During your upkeep, pay o3oBoBoB or destroy Cosmic Horror. If you destroy Cosmic Horror in this way, it deals 7 damage to you.

cards.name: Cursed Land
cards.text:
Enchant land
At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted land's controller, Cursed Land deals 1 damage to that player.

foreignNames.name: Verfluchtes Land
foreignNames.text: Der verzauberte Land fügt seinem Beherrscher während dessen Versorgungsphase 1 Schadenspunkt zu.

cards.originalText: Cursed Land deals 1 damage to target land's controller during his or her upkeep.

cards.name: Cyclopean Mummy
cards.text: When Cyclopean Mummy dies, exile it.
cards.flavor: The ritual of plucking out an eye to gain future sight is but a curse that enables the living to see their own deaths.

rulings.text: The Mummy does go to the graveyard and trigger abilities which watch for something going to the graveyard. It then gets exiled as a triggered ability.
It does not get exiled if it goes to the graveyard from someplace other than the battlefield. This includes discarding from your hand or if the spell is countered.

foreignNames.name: Zyklopenmumie
foreignNames.text: Wenn eine sich im Spiel befindliche Mumie auf den Friedhof landet, wird sie ganz aus dem Spiel entfernt.

cards.originalText: If Mummy is put into the graveyard from play, remove it from the game.

cards.name: Dark Ritual
cards.text: Add {B}{B}{B}.

foreignNames.name: Schwarzer Ritus
foreignNames.text: Erhöhe Deinen Manavorrat um BBB

foreignNames.name: Messe noire
foreignNames.text: Ajoutez {B}{B}{B} à votre réserve de mana.

foreignNames.name: Ritual Sombrio
foreignNames.text: Adiciona [B][B][B] â sua reserva de mana.

cards.originalText: Add oBoBoB to your mana pool.

cards.name: Deathgrip
cards.text: {B}{B}: Counter target green spell.

foreignNames.name: Todesgriff
foreignNames.text: {B}{B}: Neutralisiere einen grünen Spruch. Spiele diese Eigenschaft wie einen Unterbrechungs-zauber.

cards.originalText: oBooB Counter target green spell. Play this ability as an interrupt.

cards.name: Deathlace
cards.text: Target spell or permanent becomes black. (Mana symbols on that permanent remain unchanged.)

foreignNames.name: Todesgewebe
foreignNames.text: Die Farbe einer entweder sich im Spiel befindlichen oder gerade gespielten Karte verändert sich in Schwarz. Völlig unberührt davon bleiben der Gebrauch einer bestimmten Fähigkeit und die Kosten des Zauberns, des Tappens oder der Versorgung des Ziels.

cards.originalText: Change the color of target spell or target permanent to black. Costs to cast, tap, maintain, or use a special ability of target remain unchanged.

cards.name: Drain Life
cards.text:
Spend only black mana on X.
Drain Life deals X damage to any target. You gain life equal to the damage dealt, but not more life than the player's life total before the damage was dealt, the planeswalker's loyalty before the damage was dealt, or the creature's toughness.

rulings.text: Cost reducers can be used to reduce the X part of the mana cost.
You may gain up to the total toughness of the creature even if it was already damaged.

foreignNames.name: Dunkler Sog
foreignNames.text: Für jedes {B} das Du zusätzlich zu den Beschwörungskosten ausgibst, fügt der Dunkle Sog seinem Ziel —das kann sowohl Spieler als auch Kreatur sein —einen Schadenspunkt zu. Sodann bekommst Du für jeden so angerichteten Schadenspunkt 1 Lebenspunkt dazu. Du kannst allerdings nicht mehr Lebenspunkte gewinnen als die Kreatur Widerstandskraft bzw. der Spieler Lebenspunkte besitzt.

cards.originalText: Drain Life deals 1 damage to a target creature or player for each oB you pay in addition to the casting cost. You then gain 1 life for each 1 damage dealt. You cannot gain more life than the toughness of the creature or the total life of the player Drain Life damages.

cards.name: Drudge Skeletons
cards.text: {B}: Regenerate Drudge Skeletons. (The next time this creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)
cards.flavor: Bones scattered around us joined to form misshapen bodies. We struck at them repeatedly—they fell, but soon formed again, with the same mocking look on their faceless skulls.

foreignNames.name: Heer der geplagten Skelette
foreignNames.text: {B}: Regeneration

cards.originalText: ooB Regenerate

cards.name: El-Hajjâj
cards.text: Whenever El-Hajjâj deals damage, you gain that much life.

foreignNames.name: El-Hajjâj
foreignNames.text: Du gewinnst 1 Lebenspunkt für jeden Schadenspunkt, den El-Hajjaj beliebigen Gegnern zufügt. Du kannst allerdings nicht mehr Lebenspunkte gewinnen als die angegriffene Kreatur Widerstandskraft bzw. der Spieler Lebenspunkte besitzt.

cards.originalText: Gain 1 life for every 1 damage El-Hajjâj deals. You cannot gain more life in this way than the toughness of the creature or the total life of the player that El-Hajjâj damages.

cards.name: El-Hajjâj
cards.text: Whenever El-Hajjâj deals damage, you gain that much life.

cards.name: Erg Raiders
cards.text: At the beginning of your end step, if Erg Raiders didn't attack this turn, Erg Raiders deals 2 damage to you unless it came under your control this turn.

rulings.text: A creature “comes under your control” if it enters the battlefield under your control or if you gain control of it while it’s already on the battlefield.

foreignNames.name: Wüstenräuber
foreignNames.text: Wenn Du mit den Räubern nicht angreifst, fügen sie Dir am Ende der Runde 2 Schadenspunkte zuallerdings nicht in der Runde, in der Du sie beschworen hast.

cards.originalText: If you do not attack with Erg Raiders during your turn, it deals 2 damage to you at end of turn. Erg Raiders deals no damage to you the turn it comes into play on your side.

cards.name: Evil Presence
cards.text:
Enchant land
Enchanted land is a Swamp.

rulings.text: The enchanted land loses its existing land types and any abilities printed on it. It now has the land type Swamp and has the ability “{T}: Add {B}.” Evil Presence doesn’t change the enchanted land’s name or whether it’s legendary, basic, or snow.

foreignNames.name: Gegenwart des Bösen
foreignNames.text: Das verzauberte Land wird zu einem Standard-Sumpf.

cards.originalText: Target land becomes a basic swamp.

cards.name: Fear
cards.text:
Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that creature.)
Enchanted creature has fear. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)

foreignNames.name: Furcht
foreignNames.text: Die verzauberte Kreatur kann nur durch schwarze Kreaturen und Artefaktkreaturen geblockt werden.

cards.originalText: Target creature cannot be blocked except by black creatures and artifact creatures.

cards.name: Frozen Shade
cards.text: {B}: Frozen Shade gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"There are some qualities, some incorporate things, / That have a double life, which thus is made / A type of twin entity which springs / From matter and light, evinced in solid and shade."
—Edgar Allan Poe, "Silence"

foreignNames.name: Schauriger Schatten
foreignNames.text: {B}: +1/+1 bis zum Ende des Zuges.

cards.originalText: ooB +1/+1 until end of turn

cards.name: Gloom
cards.text:
White spells cost {3} more to cast.
Activated abilities of white enchantments cost {3} more to activate.

rulings.text: The extra mana is not considered part of the activation cost. It is a separate cost.
The additional mana is paid at the same time the spell/ability is cast/activated.
The extra mana is part of the total cost, so cost reducers can be applied to this cost.
Activated abilities contain a colon. They’re generally written “[Cost]: [Effect].” Some keywords are activated abilities and will have colons in their reminder text.

foreignNames.name: Düsternis
foreignNames.text: Das Sprechen weißer Zaubersprüche verteuert sich um 3 Mana. Weiße Verzauberungen mit Aktivierungskosten werden ebenfalls um 3 Mana teurer.

cards.originalText: White spells cost an additional o3 to cast. White enchantments with activation costs require an additional o3 to use.

cards.name: Greed
cards.text: {B}, Pay 2 life: Draw a card.
cards.flavor:
"There is no calamity greater than lavish desires. . . . And there is no greater disaster than greed."
—Tao Tê Ching 46

foreignNames.name: Habgier
foreignNames.text: {B}:Zahle 2 Lebenspunkte, um eine weitere Karte zu ziehen. Effekte, die Schaden verhindern oder umleiten, können hier nicht angewendet werden, um den Verlust der Lebenspunkte zu verhindern.

Fügt das Gespenst einem Spieler Schaden zu, so muß dieser eine zufällig ausgewählte Karte aus seiner Hand abwerfen. Hat derjenige Spieler keine Karten auf der Hand, ignoriere diesen Effekt.

Flying

cards.name: Junún Efreet

Flying
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Junún Efreet unless you pay {B}{B}.

Flying

cards.name: Lord of the Pit
cards.text:
Flying, trample
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice a creature other than Lord of the Pit. If you can't, Lord of the Pit deals 7 damage to you.

rulings.text: If you control any other creatures as Lord of the Pit’s triggered ability resolves, you must sacrifice one. You can’t choose to be dealt 7 damage instead.

If Lord of the Pit has gained lifelink, being dealt 7 damage by it doesn’t cause your life total to change, even though you gain and lose life. If your life total is less than 7, you won’t lose the game.
If you have two Lords of the Pit, you can sacrifice them to each other.

foreignNames.name: Fürst der Unterwelt
foreignNames.text:
Kann fliegen und verursacht Trampelschaden
Opfere während Deiner Versorgungsphase eine Deiner eigenen Kreaturen. Wenn Du keine Kreaturen opfern kannst, fügt Dir der Fürst der Unterwelt 7 Schadenspunkte zu. Du kannst den Fürsten der Unterwelt allerdings nicht sich selbst opfern.

cards.originalText:
Flying, trample
During your upkeep, sacrifice a creature. If you cannot sacrifice a creature, Lord of the Pit deals 7 damage to you. You cannot sacrifice Lord of the Pit to itself.

cards.name: Lost Soul
cards.text: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)
cards.flavor: Her hand gently beckons, she whispers your name— But those who go with her are never the same.

foreignNames.name: Verlorene Seele
foreignNames.text: Sumpftarnung

cards.originalText: Swampwalk

cards.name: Marsh Gas
cards.text: All creatures get -2/-0 until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"Comes right outta th' ground. If ya can smell it, it's too late."
—Keevy Bogsbury

foreignNames.name: Sumpfgas
foreignNames.text: Alle Kreaturen erhalten -2/-0 bis zum Ende des Zuges.

cards.originalText: All creatures get -2/-0 until end of turn.

cards.name: Mind Twist
cards.text: Target player discards X cards at random.

foreignNames.name: Wahnsinn
foreignNames.text: Ein Spieler Deiner Wahl muß X zufällig ausgesuchte Karten aus seiner Hand abwerfen. Hat er nicht genug Karten, dann muß er alle seine Karten abwerfen.

cards.originalText: Target player discards X cards at random from his or her hand. If that player does not have enough cards, his or her entire hand is discarded.

cards.name: Murk Dwellers
cards.text: Whenever Murk Dwellers attacks and isn't blocked, it gets +2/+0 until end of combat.
cards.flavor: When Raganorn unsealed the catacombs, he found more than the dead and their treasures.

rulings.text: An ability that triggers when something “attacks and isn’t blocked” triggers in the declare blockers step after blockers are declared if (1) that creature is attacking and (2) no creatures are declared to block it. It will trigger even if that creature was put onto the battlefield attacking rather than having been declared as an attacker in the declare attackers step.

foreignNames.name: Bewohner der Dunkelheit
foreignNames.text: Greifen die Bewohner der Dunkelheit an und werden nicht geblockt, erhalten sie +2/+0 bis zum Ende des Zuges.

cards.originalText: When attacking and not blocked, Murk Dwellers gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

cards.name: Nether Shadow
cards.text:
Haste
At the beginning of your upkeep, if Nether Shadow is in your graveyard with three or more creature cards above it, you may put Nether Shadow onto the battlefield.

rulings.text: Since it enters the battlefield due to triggering at the beginning of upkeep, it is not possible to get an infinite loop with four Nether Shadows.
Note that bringing the Shadow back onto the battlefield from the graveyard is not a spell, it is an ability. It can’t be countered with something that counters spells.
Players may not rearrange the cards in their graveyards.

The last thing that happens to a resolving instant or sorcery spell is that it’s put into its owner’s graveyard. Example: You cast Wrath of God. All creatures on the battlefield are destroyed. You arrange all the cards put into your graveyard this way in any order you want. The other players in the game do the same to the cards that are put into their graveyards. Then you put Wrath of God into your graveyard, on top of the other cards.

Say you’re the owner of both a permanent and an Aura that’s attached to it. If both the permanent and the Aura are destroyed at the same time (by Akroma’s Vengeance, for example), you decide the order they’re put into your graveyard. If just the enchanted permanent is destroyed, it’s put into your graveyard first. Then, after state-based actions are checked, the Aura (which is no longer attached to anything) is put into your graveyard on top of it.
A card is “above” another card in your graveyard if it was put into that graveyard later.
If an effect or rule puts two or more cards into the same graveyard at the same time, the owner of those cards may arrange them in any order.

foreignNames.name: Niederschatten
foreignNames.text: Liegt der Schatten am Ende Deiner Versorgungsphase auf Deinem Friedhof und liegen noch mindestens drei Kreaturen über ihm, kannst Du ihn das Spiel zurückbringen. Der Schatten kann in derselben Runde angreifen, in der er heraufbeschworen oder ins Spiel zurückgekehrt ist.

cards.originalText: At the end of your upkeep, if Shadow is in your graveyard with at least three creature cards above it, you may return it to play. Shadow can attack the turn it comes into play.

cards.name: Nightmare
cards.text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
Nightmare's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Swamps you control.
cards.flavor: The Nightmare arises from its lair in the swamps. As the poisoned land spreads, so does the Nightmare's rage and terrifying strength.

rulings.text: If you control 0 swamps, then the Nightmare has 0 toughness and will be put into its owner’s graveyard as a state-based action right before the next player gains priority.
Nightmare’s power and toughness changes as the number of Swamps you control changes.
The ability that defines Nightmare’s power and toughness works everywhere, not just on the battlefield.
Nightmare’s ability counts all lands you control with the subtype Swamp, not just ones named Swamp.

foreignNames.name: Nachtmahr
foreignNames.text:
Kann fliegen.
Stärke und Widerstandskraft des Nachtmahrs entsprechen der Anzahl der Sümpfe, die der Beherrscher im Spiel hat.

cards.originalText:
Flying
Nightmare has power and toughness each equal to the number of swamps its controller controls.

cards.name: Paralyze
cards.text:
Enchant creature
When Paralyze enters the battlefield, tap enchanted creature.
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.
At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, that player may pay {4}. If the player does, untap the creature.

rulings.text: Paying the cost is optional.
Paralyze can be cast targeting a creature which is already tapped.
The creature can only be untapped using Paralyze once per turn.
Two Paralyzes are not cumulative. Paying either one will untap the creature.
This is a change from the most recent wording. As was the case in the past, Paralyze itself has the last triggered ability, rather than granting that ability to the enchanted creature.

foreignNames.name: Lähmung
foreignNames.text: Die verzauberte Kreatur kann nicht während der Enttap-Phase normal enttappt werden. Der Beherrscher der Kreatur muß in der Versorgungsphase 4 bezahlen, um sie zu enttappen. Tappe die Kreatur, wenn die Lähmung auf sie gesprochen wird.

cards.originalText: Target creature does not untap during its controller's untap phase. That player may pay an additional o4 during his or her upkeep to untap it. Tap target creatures when Paralyze comes into play.

cards.name: Pestilence
cards.text:
At the beginning of the end step, if no creatures are on the battlefield, sacrifice Pestilence.
{B}: Pestilence deals 1 damage to each creature and each player.

rulings.text: Each activation is considered a new damage effect. An activation can only be 1 point of damage.
Note that “until end of turn” effects wear off after “at the beginning of the end step” triggered abilities, so an artifact that animates until end of turn can keep this on the battlefield.

It will stay on the battlefield if there is a creature that is put into the graveyard during the end step. This is because this ability will not trigger at all if there is at least one creature on the battlefield as the end step begins.

foreignNames.name: Der Schwarze Tod
foreignNames.text:
Sollten am Ende eines Spielzuges keine Kreaturen mehr im Spiel sein, geht der schwarze Tod auf den Friedhof.
{B}: Der schwarze Tod verursacht 1 Schadenspunkt bei allen Kreaturen und allen Spielern.

cards.originalText:
At the end of any turn, if there are no creatures in play, bury Pestilence.
ooB Pestilence deals 1 damage to all creatures and players.

cards.name: Pit Scorpion
cards.text: Whenever Pit Scorpion deals damage to a player, that player gets a poison counter. (A player with ten or more poison counters loses the game.)
cards.flavor: Sometimes the smallest nuisance can be the greatest pain.

foreignNames.name: Grubenskorpion
foreignNames.text: Wenn ein Grubenskorpion einen Spieler verletzt, bekommt er eine Giftmarke. Sobald ein Spieler zehn oder mehr davon hat, verliert er das Spiel automatisch.

cards.originalText: If Pit Scorpion damages a player, he or she gets a poison counter. If a player has ten or more poison counters, he or she loses the game.

cards.name: Plague Rats
cards.text: Plague Rats's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures named Plague Rats on the battlefield.
cards.flavor: During the dark times, the rats seemed to grow ever stronger.

foreignNames.name: Pestratten
foreignNames.text: Pestratten haben soviel Stärke und Widerstandskraft wie Pestratten im Spiel sind, egal unter wessen Kontrolle. Wenn beispielsweise zwei Pestratten im Spiel sind, haben beide Stärke und Widerstandskraft 2/2.

cards.originalText: Plague Rats has power and toughness each equal to the number of Plague Rats in play, no matter who controls them. For example, if there are two Plague Rats in play, each has power and toughness 2/2.

cards.name: Rag Man
cards.text: {B}{B}{B}, {T}: Target opponent reveals their hand and discards a creature card at random. Activate this ability only during your turn.
cards.flavor: "Aw, he's just a silly, dirty little man. What's to be afraid of?"

foreignNames.name: Lumpensammler
foreignNames.text: {B}{B}{B}, {T}: Schaue Dir die Karten, die ein Spieler Deiner Wahl auf der Hand hat, an. Dieser Spieler wirft eine zufällig bestimmte Kreaturenkarte ab. Benutze diese Fähigkeit nur während Deines Zuges.

cards.originalText: oBoBoB, ocT: Look at target opponent's hand. If that player has any creature cards in hand, he or she discards one of them at random. Use this ability only during your turn.

cards.name: Raise Dead
cards.text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

rulings.text: You must show the card you bring out of the graveyard to your opponent.
The creature being brought back is chosen on announcement and not on resolution of the spell because it is targeted.

foreignNames.name: Auferstehung der Toten
foreignNames.text: Nimm ein Wesen aus dem Friedhof und zurück auf Deine Hand.

cards.originalText: Take target creature from your graveyard and put it into your hand.

cards.name: Royal Assassin
cards.text: {T}: Destroy target tapped creature.
cards.flavor: Trained in the arts of stealth, the Royal Assassins choose their victims carefully, relying on timing and precision rather than brute force.

rulings.text: Can’t target itself because you choose the target before you tap him. At that time he is not yet a legal target.
If the creature is no longer tapped when the Assassin’s ability resolves, then the ability doesn’t resolve.

foreignNames.name: Meistermeuchler
foreignNames.text: {T}: Zerstöre eine getappte Kreatur Deiner Wahl.

cards.originalText: ocT: Destroy target tapped creature.

cards.name: Scathe Zombies
cards.flavor:
"They groaned, they stirred, they all uprose, Nor spake, nor moved their eyes; It had been strange, even in a dream, To have seen those dead men rise."
—Samuel Coleridge, "The Rime of the Ancient Mariner"

cards.name: Scavenging Ghoul
cards.text:
At the beginning of each end step, put a corpse counter on Scavenging Ghoul for each creature that died this turn.
Remove a corpse counter from Scavenging Ghoul: Regenerate Scavenging Ghoul.

rulings.text: The Ghoul still gets to claim counters even if it enters the battlefield after the creatures died.

foreignNames.name: Leichenfledderer
foreignNames.text:
Lege am Ende jedes Zuges für jede Kreatur, die in diesem Zug vernichtet wurde, eine Leichen-Spielmarke auf den Ghoul.
0: Entferne eine Leichenmarke, um den Ghoul zu regenerieren.

cards.originalText:
At the end of each turn, put a corpse counter on Scavenging Ghoul for each creature put into the graveyard during that turn.
o0: Remove a corpse counter from Scavenging Ghoul to regenerate it.

cards.name: Sengir Vampire
cards.text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
Whenever a creature dealt damage by Sengir Vampire this turn dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Sengir Vampire.

rulings.text: If Sengir Vampire deals nonlethal damage to a creature and then a different effect or damage source causes that creature to be put into a graveyard later in the turn, Sengir Vampire’s ability will trigger and it will get a +1/+1 counter.

Each time a creature is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, check whether Sengir Vampire had dealt any damage to it at any time during that turn. If so, Sengir Vampire’s ability will trigger. It doesn’t matter who controlled the creature or whose graveyard it was put into.
If Sengir Vampire and a creature it dealt damage to are both put into a graveyard at the same time, Sengir Vampire’s ability will trigger, but it will do nothing when it resolves.

foreignNames.name: Sengir-Vampir
foreignNames.text:
Kann fliegen.
Lege eine +1/+1 Spielmarke auf den Vampir, wenn ein Wesen, den er in diesem Zug Schaden zugefügt hat, auf dem Friedhof landet.

cards.originalText:
Flying
Put a +1/+1 counter on Sengir Vampire each time a creature is put into the graveyard the same turn Sengir Vampire damaged it.

cards.name: Simulacrum
cards.text: You gain life equal to the damage dealt to you this turn. Simulacrum deals damage to target creature you control equal to the damage dealt to you this turn.

rulings.text: You can’t use Simulacrum on Loss of Life, just damage.
This is not damage prevention or redirection. It actually is life gain and newly dealt damage.
Simulacrum is the source of the damage. If an effect needs to know a characteristic of the damage’s source (Protection from Black, for instance), it will see the damage coming from Simulacrum.

foreignNames.name: Simulakrum
foreignNames.text: Alle Schadenspunkte, die Dir bislang in diesem Zug zugefügt worden sind, werden rückwirkend auf eine Deiner Kreaturen gelenkt. Falls Du in diesem Zug weiteren Schaden erleidest, wird dieser allerdings ganz normal behandelt.

cards.originalText: All damage done to you so far this turn is instead retroactively applied to a target creature you control. Further damage this turn is treated normally.

cards.name: Sorceress Queen
cards.text: {T}: Target creature other than Sorceress Queen has base power and toughness 0/2 until end of turn.

foreignNames.name: Hexenkönigin
foreignNames.text: {T}: Ändere die Werte einer anderen Kreatur Deiner Wahl bis zum Ende des Zuges auf 0/2.

cards.originalText: ocT: Target creature other than Sorceress Queen becomes 0/2 until end of turn.

cards.name: Spirit Shackle
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Whenever enchanted creature becomes tapped, put a -0/-2 counter on it.

rulings.text: Spirit Shackle’s ability triggers only when the enchanted creature changes from untapped to tapped. If Spirit Shackle enters the battlefield attached to an already tapped creature, it won’t do anything (until that creature untaps and becomes tapped again, that is).

cards.originalText: Put a -0/-2 counter on target creature every time it becomes tapped. These counters remain even if Spirit Shackle is removed.

cards.name: Terror
cards.text: Destroy target nonartifact, nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.

foreignNames.name: Terror
foreignNames.text: Begrabe eine nicht-schwarze Nicht-Artefaktkreatur Deiner Wahl.

cards.originalText: Bury target non-black, non-artifact creature.

cards.name: Uncle Istvan
cards.text: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Uncle Istvan by creatures.
cards.flavor: Solitude drove the old hermit insane. Now he only keeps company with those he can catch.

rulings.text: Works even on damage from activated abilities of creatures such as Prodigal Sorcerer.

foreignNames.name: Onkel Istvan
foreignNames.text: Aller Schaden, der Onkel Istvan von Kreaturen zugefügt wird, wird auf 0 reduziert.

foreignNames.name: イシュトヴァーンおじ

cards.originalText: All damage done to Uncle Istvan by creatures is reduced to 0.

cards.text:

Enchanted creature gets +2/+1.

foreignNames.name: Unheilige Stärke
foreignNames.text: Die verzauberte Kreatur erhält +2/+1.

cards.originalText: Target creature gets +2/+1.

cards.name: Vampire Bats
cards.text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
{B}: Vampire Bats gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Activate this ability no more than twice each turn.
cards.flavor:
"For something is amiss or out of place When mice with wings can wear a human face."
—Theodore Roethke, "The Bat"

foreignNames.name: Vampirfledermäuse
foreignNames.text:
Fliegend
{B}: +1/+0 bis zum Ende des Zuges. Du kannst nicht mehr als BB auf diese Arte pro Zug einsetzen.

cards.originalText:
Flying
ooB +1/+0 until end of turn. You cannot spend more than oBoB in this way each turn.

cards.name: Wall of Bone
cards.text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
{B}: Regenerate Wall of Bone. (The next time this creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)
cards.flavor: The Wall of Bone is said to be an aspect of the Great Wall in Hel, where the bones of all sinners wait for Ragnarok, when Hela will call them forth for the final battle.

foreignNames.name: Knochenmauer
foreignNames.text: {B}: Regeneration

cards.originalText: ooB Regenerate

cards.text:
Enchant artifact
At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted artifact's controller, Warp Artifact deals 1 damage to that player.

foreignNames.name: Verformtes Artefakt
foreignNames.text: Dieser Spruch fügt dem Beherrscher des verzauberten Artefakts während dessen Versorgungsphase 1 Schadenspunkt zu.

cards.originalText: Warp Artifact deals 1 damage to target artifact's controller during his or her upkeep.

Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets -2/-1.

foreignNames.name: Schwäche
foreignNames.text: Die verzauberte Kreatur erhält -2/-1.

cards.originalText: Target creature gets -2/-1.

cards.name: Will-o'-the-Wisp
cards.text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
{B}: Regenerate Will-o'-the-Wisp. (The next time this creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)
cards.flavor:
"About, about in reel and rout The death-fires danced at night; The water, like a witch's oils, Burnt green, and blue and white."
—Samuel Coleridge, "The Rime of the Ancient Mariner"

foreignNames.name: Irrlichter
foreignNames.text:
Können fliegen.
{B}: Regeneration

cards.originalText:
Flying
ooB Regenerate

cards.name: Word of Binding
cards.text: Tap X target creatures.
cards.flavor:
"That was the worst experience of my days: standing there helpless as they killed my whole troop."
—Maeveen O'Donagh, *Memoirs of a Soldier*

foreignNames.name: Wort der Fesselung
foreignNames.text: Tappe X Zielkreaturen.

cards.originalText: Tap X target creatures.

cards.name: Xenic Poltergeist
cards.text: {T}: Until your next upkeep, target noncreature artifact becomes an artifact creature with power and toughness each equal to its converted mana cost.

rulings.text: Wears off at the beginning of the upkeep, not during upkeep.

A noncreature permanent that turns into a creature can attack, and its {T} abilities can be activated, only if its controller has continuously controlled that permanent since the beginning of their most recent turn. It doesn’t matter how long the permanent has been a creature.

foreignNames.name: Xenischer Poltergeist
foreignNames.text: {T}: Ein Nicht-Kreatur- Artefakt wird zu einer Artefaktkreatur mit sowohl Stärke als auch Widerstandskraft in Höhe der Spruchkosten des Artefakts. Das Zielartefakt behält allerdings alle seine Originaleigenschaften. Diese Veränderung dauert bis zu Deiner nächsten Versorgungsphase an.

cards.originalText: ocT: Target non-creature artifact becomes an artifact creature with power and toughness each equal to its casting cost. Target retains all original abilities. This change lasts until your next upkeep.

cards.name: Zombie Master
cards.text:
Other Zombie creatures have swampwalk. (They can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)
Other Zombies have "{B}: Regenerate this permanent."
cards.flavor: They say the Zombie Master controlled these foul creatures even before his own death, but now that he is one of them, nothing can make them betray him.
cards.originalText:
All zombies gain swampwalk and
"ooB Regenerate."

cards.name: Beacon of Unrest
cards.text: Put target artifact or creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. Shuffle Beacon of Unrest into its owner's library.
cards.flavor: A vertical scream pierces the night air and echoes doom through the clouds.

rulings.text: If a Beacon is countered or doesn’t resolve, it’s put into its owner’s graveyard, not shuffled into the library.

foreignNames.name: Leitstern der Unruhe
foreignNames.text: Bringe eine Artefakt- oder Kreaturenkarte deiner Wahl aus einem Friedhof unter deiner Kontrolle ins Spiel. Mische den Leitstern der Unruhe in die Bibliothek seines Besitzers.
foreignNames.flavor: Ein Schrei durchschneidet senkrecht die Nachtluft, und Verderben hallt durch die Wolken.

foreignNames.name: Faro de desasosiego
foreignNames.text: Pon en juego bajo tu control la carta de artefacto o criatura objetivo de un cementerio. Baraja el Faro de desasosiego en la biblioteca de su propietario.
foreignNames.flavor: Un grito vertical perfora el aire nocturno y anuncia la perdición entre las nubes.

foreignNames.name: Flambeau de l'Inquiétude
foreignNames.text: Mettez en jeu sous votre contrôle une carte de créature ou d'artefact ciblée d'un cimetière. Mélangez le Flambeau de l'Inquiétude à la bibliothèque de son propriétaire.
foreignNames.flavor: Un cri vertical perce la nuit et se répercute, telle la mort, dans les nuages.

foreignNames.name: Faro dell'Inquietudine
foreignNames.text: Metti in gioco sotto il tuo controllo una carta artefatto o creatura bersaglio presente in un cimitero. Rimescola il Faro dell'Inquietudine nel grimorio del suo proprietario.
foreignNames.flavor: Un urlo al cielo squarcia l'aria della notte e fa riecheggiare il destino tra le nubi.

foreignNames.name: 不穏の標
foreignNames.text: いずれかの墓地にあるアーティファクト・カード１枚かクリーチャー・カード１枚を対象とし、それをあなたのコントロール下で場に出す。不穏の標をオーナーのライブラリーに加えて切り直す。
foreignNames.flavor: 天からの叫び声が夜空を引き裂き、雲間から運命の響きを轟かせる。

foreignNames.name: Guia da Inquietação
foreignNames.text: Coloque em jogo sob o seu controle o card alvo de artefato ou de criatura de um cemitério. Embaralhe Guia da Inquietação no grimório de seu dono.
foreignNames.flavor: Um grito agudo atravessa a noite e ecoa perdição por entre as nuvens.

foreignNames.name: 不息信标
foreignNames.text: 将任一坟墓场中的目标神器或生物牌在你的操控下放置进场。将不息信标洗入其拥有者的牌库。
foreignNames.flavor: 悚栗凄嚎划破夜空，厄运祸音回荡云际。

cards.originalText: Put target artifact or creature card from a graveyard into play under your control. Shuffle Beacon of Unrest into its owner's library.

cards.name: Blind Creeper
cards.text: Whenever a player casts a spell, Blind Creeper gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: It shuns everything except its next meal.

rulings.text: This ability triggers off anyone casting a spell, including you, not just Blind Creeper’s controller or an opponent.

foreignNames.name: Blinder Kriecher
foreignNames.text: Immer wenn ein Spieler einen Zauberspruch spielt, erhält der Blinde Kriecher -1/-1 bis zum Ende des Zuges.
foreignNames.flavor: Er weicht allem aus außer seiner nächsten Mahlzeit.

foreignNames.name: Trepador ciego
foreignNames.text: Siempre que un jugador juegue un hechizo, el Trepador ciego obtiene -1/-1 hasta el final del turno.
foreignNames.flavor: Evita todo excepto su próxima comida.

foreignNames.name: Fureteur aveugle
foreignNames.text: À chaque fois qu'un joueur joue un sort, le Fureteur aveugle gagne -1/-1 jusqu'à la fin du tour.
foreignNames.flavor: Son prochain repas est la seule chose qu'il n'esquive pas.

foreignNames.name: Strisciante Cieco
foreignNames.text: Ogniqualvolta un giocatore gioca una magia, lo Strisciante Cieco prende -1/-1 fino alla fine del turno.
foreignNames.flavor: Evita qualsiasi cosa, tranne il suo prossimo pranzo.

foreignNames.name: 盲目の忍び寄るもの
foreignNames.text: いずれかのプレイヤーが呪文をプレイするたび、盲目の忍び寄るものはターン終了時まで-1/-1の修整を受ける。
foreignNames.flavor: そいつは次の餌以外からは身を潜める。

foreignNames.name: Rastejador Cego
foreignNames.text: Toda vez que um jogador jogar uma mágica, Rastejador Cego recebe -1/-1 até o final do turno.
foreignNames.flavor: Ele foge de tudo menos de sua próxima refeição.

foreignNames.name: 盲目匍行兽
foreignNames.text: 每当牌手使用咒语时，盲目匍行兽得-1/-1直到回合结束。
foreignNames.flavor: 除了餐点之外，它什么都不想招惹。

cards.originalText: Whenever a player plays a spell, Blind Creeper gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

cards.name: Bringer of the Black Dawn
cards.text:
You may pay {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Trample
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may pay 2 life. If you do, search your library for a card, then shuffle your library and put that card on top of it.

foreignNames.name: Bringer des Schwarzen Morgens
foreignNames.text:
Du kannst {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} bezahlen, anstatt die Manakosten des Bringers des Schwarzen Morgens zu bezahlen.
Verursacht Trampelschaden.
Zu Beginn deines Versorgungssegments kannst du 2 Lebenspunkte bezahlen. Falls du dies tust, durchsuche deine Bibliothek nach einer Karte, mische dann deine Bibliothek und lege diese Karte oben auf deine Bibliothek.

foreignNames.name: Adalid del amanecer negro
foreignNames.text:
Puedes pagar {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} en lugar de pagar el coste de maná del Adalid del amanecer negro.
Arrolla.
Al comienzo de tu mantenimiento, puedes pagar 2 vidas. Si lo haces, busca una carta en tu biblioteca, luego barájala y pon esa carta en la parte superior de la biblioteca.

foreignNames.name: Annonciateur de l'Aube noire
foreignNames.text:
Vous pouvez payer {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} à la place du coût de mana de l'Annonciateur de l'Aube noire.
Piétinement
Au début de votre entretien, vous pouvez payer 2 points de vie. Si vous faites ainsi, cherchez une carte dans votre bibliothèque, mélangez votre bibliothèque et mettez ensuite cette carte au-dessus d'elle.

foreignNames.name: Portatore dell'Alba Nera
foreignNames.text:
Puoi spendere {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} invece di pagare il costo di mana del Portatore dell'Alba Nera.
Travolgere
All'inizio del tuo mantenimento, puoi pagare 2 punti vita. Se lo fai, passa in rassegna il tuo grimorio, scegli una carta, poi rimescola il tuo grimorio e metti quella carta in cima a esso.

foreignNames.name: 黒の夜明けの運び手
foreignNames.text:
あなたは黒の夜明けを運び手のマナ・コストを支払うのではなく、{W}{U}{B}{R}{G}を支払ってもよい。
トランプル
あなたのアップキープの開始時に、あなたは２点のライフを支払ってもよい。そうした場合、あなたのライブラリーからカードを１枚探し、その後ライブラリーを切り直してそのカードを一番上に置く。

foreignNames.name: Portador da Aurora Preta
foreignNames.text:
Você pode pagar {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} em vez de pagar o custo de mana do Portador da Aurora Preta.
Atropelar
No início de sua manutenção, você pode pagar 2 pontos de vida. Se o fizer, procure em seu grimório por um card, embaralhe o seu grimório e depois coloque aquele card no topo dele.

foreignNames.name: 黑曙光信使
foreignNames.text:
你可支付{W}{U}{B}{R}{G}，而不支付黑曙光信使的法术力费用。
践踏
在你的维持开始时，你可以支付2点生命。若你如此作，则从你的牌库中搜寻一张牌，然后将你的牌库洗牌，并将该牌置于其上。

cards.originalText:
You may pay {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} rather than pay Bringer of the Black Dawn's mana cost.
Trample
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may pay 2 life. If you do, search your library for a card, then shuffle your library and put that card on top of it.

cards.name: Cackling Imp
cards.text:
Flying
{T}: Target player loses 1 life.
cards.flavor: Its laughter drives needles through your mind.

foreignNames.name: Kichernder Bold
foreignNames.text:
Fliegend
{T}: Ein Spieler deiner Wahl verliert 1 Lebenspunkt.
foreignNames.flavor: Sein Gelächter treibt Nadeln durch dein Hirn.

foreignNames.name: Diablillo carcajeante
foreignNames.text:
Vuela.
{T}: El jugador objetivo pierde 1 vida.
foreignNames.flavor: Su risa perfora tu mente.

foreignNames.name: Diablotin caquetant
foreignNames.text:
Vol
{T} : Le joueur ciblé perd 1 point de vie.
foreignNames.flavor: Son rire vous perce la cervelle comme une aiguille.

foreignNames.name: Demonietto Ghignante
foreignNames.text:
Volare
{T}: Il giocatore bersaglio perde 1 punto vita.
foreignNames.flavor: La sua risata infila degli spilli nella tua mente.

foreignNames.name: 大笑いのインプ
foreignNames.text:
飛行
{T}：プレイヤー１人を対象とする。そのプレイヤーは１点のライフを失う。
foreignNames.flavor: その笑い声は心に針を撃ち込む。

foreignNames.name: Diabrete Gargalhante
foreignNames.text:
Voar
{T}: O jogador alvo perde 1 ponto de vida.
foreignNames.flavor: Sua risada introduz agulhas na tua mente.

foreignNames.name: 尖笑小恶魔
foreignNames.text:
飞行
{T}：目标牌手失去1点生命。
foreignNames.flavor: 其尖笑令人如坐针毡。

cards.originalText:
Flying
{T}: Target player loses 1 life.

cards.name: Desecration Elemental
cards.text:
Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
Whenever a player casts a spell, sacrifice a creature.
cards.flavor: Its precious corpses dance like puppets to attract mindless nim prey.

rulings.text: This ability triggers off anyone casting a spell, including you, not just Desecration Elemental’s controller or an opponent.
If Desecration Elemental is the only creature you control when its triggered ability resolves, you’ll have to sacrifice it.

foreignNames.name: Entweihungselementar
foreignNames.text:
Verursacht Furcht.
Immer wenn ein Spieler einen Zauberspruch spielt, opfere eine Kreatur.
foreignNames.flavor: Es lässt seine kostbaren Leichen wie Marionetten tanzen, um seine Beute hirnlose Nim anzulocken.

foreignNames.name: Elemental de profanación
foreignNames.text:
Inspirar temor.
Siempre que un jugador juegue un hechizo, sacrifica una criatura.
foreignNames.flavor: Sus valiosos cadáveres bailan como marionetas para atraer a sus presas nim.

foreignNames.name: Élémental de profanation
foreignNames.text:
Peur
À chaque fois qu'un joueur joue un sort, sacrifiez une créature.
foreignNames.flavor: Ses précieux cadavres dansent comme des pantins désarticulés pour attirer les nims.

foreignNames.name: Elementale Profanatore
foreignNames.text:
Paura
Ogniqualvolta un giocatore gioca una magia, sacrifica una creatura.
foreignNames.flavor: I suoi preziosi corpi danzano come marionette per attirare le incuranti prede nim.

foreignNames.name: 冒涜の精霊
foreignNames.text:
畏怖
いずれかのプレイヤーが呪文をプレイするたび、あなたはクリーチャーを１体生け贄に捧げる。
foreignNames.flavor: それは死体を人形のように踊らせ、思考の無い屍賊を餌として引き寄せる。

foreignNames.name: Elemental da Profanação
foreignNames.text:
Amedrontar
Toda vez que um jogador jogar uma mágica, sacrifique uma criatura.
foreignNames.flavor: Seus cadáveres preciosos dançam como fantoches para atrair e caçar nims descuidados.

foreignNames.name: 渎圣元素
foreignNames.text:
恐惧
每当牌手使用咒语时，牺牲一个生物。
foreignNames.flavor: 它操弄的死尸如傀儡般舞动着，藉以诱捕无脑可思考的泞族。

cards.originalText:
Fear
Whenever a player plays a spell, sacrifice a creature.

cards.name: Devour in Shadow
cards.text: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated. You lose life equal to that creature's toughness.
cards.flavor:
"Feel the burn of the mists. Master them. They will devour your enemies."
—Geth, keeper of the Vault

foreignNames.name: Von Schatten verschlungen
foreignNames.text: Zerstöre eine Kreatur deiner Wahl. Sie kann nicht regeneriert werden. Du verlierst Lebenspunkte in Höhe der Widerstandskraft dieser Kreatur.
foreignNames.flavor: „Fühle das Brennen der Nebel. Mach sie dir untertan, sie werden deine Feinde verschlingen." — Geth, Hüter der Gruft

foreignNames.name: Devorar en las sombras
foreignNames.text: Destruye la criatura objetivo. No puede ser regenerada. Pierdes una cantidad de vida igual a la resistencia de esa criatura.
foreignNames.flavor: "Siente el ardor de las nieblas. Domínalas. Ellas devorarán a tus enemigos." —Geth, guardián de la Bóveda

foreignNames.name: Ombre affamée
foreignNames.text: Détruisez la créature ciblée. Elle ne peut pas être régénérée. Vous perdez un nombre de points de vie égal à l'endurance de cette créature.
foreignNames.flavor: « Laissez les brumes vous brûler. Maîtrisez-les. Elles dévoreront vos ennemis. » —Geth, gardien du Caveau

foreignNames.name: Divorare nell'Ombra
foreignNames.text: Distruggi una creatura bersaglio. Non può essere rigenerata. Perdi un ammontare di punti vita pari alla costituzione di quella creatura.
foreignNames.flavor: "Percepisci l'ardore delle nebbie. Controllale e divoreranno i tuoi nemici." —Geth, custode della Volta

foreignNames.name: 影の中の貪り
foreignNames.text: クリーチャー１体を対象とし、それを破壊する。それは再生できない。あなたはそれのタフネスに等しい点数のライフを失う。
foreignNames.flavor: 霧の中の熱を感じよ。そしてそれを支配せよ。それは敵を食い尽くしてくれよう。 ―― 大霊堂の守り手ゲス

foreignNames.name: Devorar nas Sombras
foreignNames.text: Destrói a criatura alvo. Ela não pode ser regenerada. Você perde uma quantidade de pontos de vida igual à resistência daquela criatura.
foreignNames.flavor: "Sente o queimar das névoas. Domina-as. Elas devorarão teus inimigos." —Geth, custódio da Câmara

foreignNames.name: 黯影吞噬
foreignNames.text: 消灭目标生物。它不能重生。你失去等同于该生物防御力的生命。
foreignNames.flavor: 「感受迷雾噬灼；掌握这份力量。你将以之吞噬敌人。」 ～黯窖领主盖司

cards.originalText: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated. You lose life equal to that creature's toughness.

cards.name: Dross Crocodile
cards.flavor: The necrogen may have taken its sight, but it can still taste the fear of its prey.

foreignNames.name: Schlackenkrokodil
foreignNames.flavor: Das Necrogen mag ihm die Sicht genommen haben, doch er kann immer noch die Furcht seiner Beute schmecken.

foreignNames.name: Cocodrilo del Dros
foreignNames.flavor: Puede que las nieblas necrógenas se hayan llevado su vista, pero aún es capaz de saborear el miedo de su presa.

foreignNames.name: Crocodile de Mephidross
foreignNames.flavor: Les brumes nécrogènes l'ont peut-être privé de sa vue, mais il sent toujours la peur de sa proie.

foreignNames.name: Coccodrillo delle Scorie
foreignNames.flavor: I necrogeni possono avergli tolto la vista, ma riesce ancora a gustare la paura della preda.

foreignNames.name: ドロスのクロコダイル
foreignNames.flavor: 屍気がやつの視界を奪ってしまったのかもしれないが、それでもやつは餌の恐怖を味わうことができるのさ。

foreignNames.name: Crocodilo do Entulho
foreignNames.flavor: O necrogênio pode lhe ter tirado a visão, mas ele ainda consegue saborear o medo de sua caça.

foreignNames.name: 蔓非沼鳄鱼
foreignNames.flavor: 他虽被化尸瘴气夺去视力，仍能享受猎物之惊恐。

cards.name: Ebon Drake
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever a player casts a spell, you lose 1 life.
cards.flavor: The deadliest killers serve only those who are not afraid to die.

rulings.text: This ability triggers off anyone casting a spell, including you, not just Ebon Drake’s controller or an opponent.

foreignNames.name: Ebenholzsceada
foreignNames.text:
Fliegend
Immer wenn ein Spieler einen Zauberspruch spielt, verlierst du 1 Lebenspunkt.
foreignNames.flavor: Die gefährlichsten Mörder dienen nur denjenigen, die keine Angst vor dem Sterben haben.

foreignNames.name: Draco de ébano
foreignNames.text:
Vuela.
Siempre que un jugador juegue un hechizo, pierdes 1 vida.
foreignNames.flavor: Los asesinos más mortales sirven sólo a aquellos que no temen morir.

foreignNames.name: Drakôn d'ébène
foreignNames.text:
Vol
À chaque fois qu'un joueur joue un sort, vous perdez 1 point de vie.
foreignNames.flavor: Les tueurs les plus dangereux servent ceux qui n'ont pas peur de mourir.

foreignNames.name: Draghetto d'Ebano
foreignNames.text:
Volare
Ogniqualvolta un giocatore gioca una magia, perdi 1 punto vita.
foreignNames.flavor: Gli assassini più letali servono solo coloro che non hanno paura di morire.

foreignNames.name: 漆黒のドレイク
foreignNames.text:
飛行
いずれかのプレイヤーが呪文をプレイするたび、あなたは１点のライフを失う。
foreignNames.flavor: 最強の殺し屋は、死をも恐れない者にのみ仕える。

foreignNames.name: Dragonete de Ébano
foreignNames.text:
Voar
Toda vez que um jogador jogar uma mágica, você perde 1 ponto de vida.
foreignNames.flavor: Os melhores assassinos servem apenas aos que não temem a morte.

foreignNames.name: 黑檀龙兽
foreignNames.text:
飞行
每当牌手使用咒语时，你失去1点生命。
foreignNames.flavor: 不把命当一回事的人，才有资格使役最致命的杀手。

cards.originalText:
Flying
Whenever a player plays a spell, you lose 1 life.
